forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
